briefTitle: Tailored Screening for Breast Cancer in Premenopausal Women
officialTitle: Tailored Screening for Breast Cancer in Premenopausal Women. A Translational, Randomized Population-based Trial
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Comparison of cumulative incidence of interval cancer cases by arm and by density group
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* women 44-45 years old resident in the screening area

Exclusion Criteria:

* previous diagnosis of invasive or in situ breast cancer
* women with family high risk for breast cancer
* previous diagnosis of other cancers in the last 5 years
* early menopause women or in hormone replacement therapy
